com.btmatthews.maven.plugins.greenmail.mojo
Interface Logger

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractServerMojo, RunMojo, StopMojo
public interface Logger

Implemented by objects that write error and information messages to log files.

Since:
1.0.0
Author:
Brian Matthews
